definition: tailed larva/Cercaria (microscopic larva of parasitic Miracidium flatworm)
horse's tail/pointed posterior section of a locust etc
tail/remainder/remnant/extremity/sixth of the 28 constellations/classifier for fish

sentences.english: Conclusion The CMM has marked damaging effect to Cysticercus cellulosae.
sentences.chinese: 結論中藥滅囊靈對豬囊尾蚴具有明顯的殺傷作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the epidemiological status of cysticercus infection in Shandong province.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討山東省居民豬囊尾蚴感染流行狀況。

sentences.english: The morphological characteristics of the cercaria are described.
sentences.chinese: 同時對尾蚴形態特徵作了描述。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical features, laboratory tests, medical imaging manifestations, diagnosis and treatment of orbital cysticercus cellulosae.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討眼眶豬囊尾蚴的臨牀診斷及治療方法。

sentences.english: Aim To observe the ultrastructure of Cystlcercus cellulosae with Chinese metria medica(CMM) in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察中藥在體外抑制豬囊尾蚴的超微結構變化。

sentences.english: It suggests that the tegument of metacercaria is the main absorptive site of nutrients.
sentences.chinese: 結果提示皮層是後尾蚴吸收營養物質的主要部位。

sentences.english: It suggested that the spines be not an index to identify the kinds of metacercariae.
sentences.chinese: 作者認爲皮棘在後尾蚴難以作爲鑑別蟲種的指標。

sentences.english: Cysticerci were not found to grow in kidney or spleen all the time.
sentences.chinese: 在實驗全過程中，腎臟和脾臟未見囊尾蚴寄生。

sentences.english: Conclusion 45W-4B antigen of Taenia solium oncosphere induces good immune protection in pigs.
sentences.chinese: 結論該抗原對豬囊尾蚴病具有很好的免疫保護作用。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the operative methods and clinical effectives of pig cysticercosis in the eye.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討治療眼豬囊尾蚴病的手術方法及臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Objective To know the infected situation of cercarial dermatitis along the banks of Huaihe river.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解淮河水系淮南地區尾蚴性皮炎感染狀況。

sentences.english: The functions of the above substances in the acetabular glands of cercaria during the Process of penetrating host's skin were discussed in the tekt.
sentences.chinese: 並討論了這些物質在尾蚴侵襲宿主皮膚過程中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To improve new technological process of making Schistosoma japonicum cercaria specimen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索日本血吸蟲尾蚴標本製作流程的改進。

sentences.english: This article reviews the current situation on several DNA vaccines.
sentences.chinese: 本文就豬囊尾蚴病DNA疫苗的研究現狀作一綜述。

sentences.english: The ultrastructure of metacercaria of Paragonirtus westermani was observed with scanning electron microscopy.
sentences.chinese: 應用掃描電鏡觀察衛氏並殖吸蟲後尾蚴的超微結構。

sentences.english: In the body, the larvae develop into adult schistosomes.
sentences.chinese: 在人體內，尾蚴發展爲成蟲。

definition: "eel worm", a parasitic worm carrying meningitis
trematoda/fluke/trematode worm, approx 6000 species, mostly parasite, incl. on humans
imago (adult, sexually mature insect, the final stage of its development)
